Volunteer Opportunities

What You’ll Do

- To manage all school chapters in the region - To outreach and initiate contact with individuals from different schools who are qualified to start a chapter - To run inter-school chapter meetings/events - To provide resourceful event ideas, relations, and communications with the chapters in that region

Qualifications?

- Experienced in team management and executive work - Relations and/or connections with a significant amount of people from a wide variety of schools - Relations and/or connections with a significant amount of people from a wide variety of schools

Executive Positions

What You’ll Do

- To manage all school chapters in the region - To outreach and initiate contact with individuals from different schools who are qualified to start a chapter - To run inter-school chapter meetings/events - To provide resourceful event ideas, relations, and communications with the chapters in that region

Qualifications?

- Experienced in team management and executive work - Relations and/or connections with a significant amount of people from a wide variety of schools - Relations and/or connections with a significant amount of people from a wide variety of schools

Regional Multimedia Director

  • Create posters, infographics, PowerPoints, videos, and all other promotional materials
Apply

Regional Marketing Directors

  • Manage social media platforms
  • Create and initiate promotion plans
Apply

Regional Secretary

  • Keep tracks of administration files and notes
  • Take meeting minutes
Apply

Regional Website Director

  • Create a new website for regional chapters
  • Manages the website
Apply

Regional President

  • Manages regional team and oversees team performance
  • Oversees contact with chapter presidents in the region
Apply

Regional Outreach Directors

  • Reach out to schools and potential chapter leaders (students)
  • Look for sponsorships and collaborations
Apply
